commitResults.messageTitle: Changed chatbot name to Bob, as well as the respective files. Editted greeting
Chatbot now echo commands and asks for more. bye/Bye/BYE to end. Customised bot
added correct reply for each text entered
Added logic for list using ArrayLists, dynamic array.
Added logic for tasks with class Task. added logic of indexing task and logging tallies. Added logic for one based indexing of tasks. added logic for marking and unmarking tasks.
Set up the task hierarchy for the different tasks.
Added logic for all the task classes.
Added comprehensive test case that tests the command
Added if-else cases for tasks and unknown commands, each specific to the command. Also included if <space> is added after.
Added support for deleting task
Added extra error catching for delete without task number
Added Enum for task status to be DONE and NOT_DONE.
Add task auto saving to hard disk and headers
commitResults.messageBody:
Tasks previously do not save to hard disk and are lost when the programme ends.

Added hard disk storage to load up tasks and save after each task update.

Added headers following the java coding standard.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-Level-7'
Add date/time parsing and formatting for deadlines and events
commitResults.messageBody:
Store deadline and event timings using LocalDateTime instead of String.
Support parsing user input in yyyy-MM-dd and d/M/yyyy formats, with optional time.
Format dates for display as MMM dd yyyy and include time when provided.

Add data/ to gitignore

commitResults.messageTitle: Extract Task model classes and DateTimeUtil
commitResults.messageBody:
Task model classes (Task, Todo, Deadline, Event) and DateTimeUtil
are already in separate files, but Bob.java contains direct
references to constants and enums without proper class prefixes.

This ensures the Task model classes and DateTimeUtil are cleanly
separated and can be referenced properly by other classes in
subsequent refactoring steps.

commitResults.messageTitle: Extract Ui class for easier calling of display related functions
commitResults.messageBody:
Bob.java contains all user interface code (printing messages and
reading user input) mixed with business logic. This makes the code
harder to maintain and violates separation of concerns.

Extracting UI-related code into a separate Ui class improves code
organization and follows OOP principles.

This separation makes the codebase more modular.

commitResults.messageTitle: Extract Storage class for file operations
commitResults.messageBody:
Bob.java contains file loading, saving, and task serialization code
mixed with business logic. This violates separation of concerns and
makes the code harder to maintain.

Extracting file operations into a separate Storage class improves
code organization and follows OOP principles.

commitResults.messageTitle: Extract TaskList class to wrap ArrayList operations
commitResults.messageBody:
Bob.java directly uses ArrayList<Task> for task management, with
bounds checking logic scattered throughout the code. This makes the
code less maintainable and violates encapsulation principles.

Extracting task list operations into a separate TaskList class
improves code organization and provides a cleaner abstraction.

commitResults.messageTitle: Extract Parser class for command parsing
commitResults.messageBody:
Bob.java contains command parsing logic scattered throughout the main
method, with edge case handling very messy. This includes extracting
arguments from commands, parsing indices, and handling different

Extracting command parsing into a separate Parser class improves code
organization and follows OOP principles.

commitResults.messageTitle: Change Bob class to use instance fields and run()
commitResults.messageBody:
Bob class uses static methods with local variables in main,
making it difficult to extend.

Editting Bob class to use instance fields and a run() method,
improving testability and following OOP.

commitResults.messageTitle: Organise classes into packages
commitResults.messageBody:
All classes are currently in the default package (no package
declaration). This makes the codebase harder to navigate and
understand as it grows.

Organizing classes into logical packages improves code organization
and follows Java coding standards.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge add-gradle-support: add Gradle build support
Set up Gradle
commitResults.messageBody: Gradle automate project builds

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JUnit tests for Parser and DateTime
commitResults.messageBody:
JUnit tests run with Gradle so that code can be
tested efficiently and follow Java coding standards

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaDoc comments
commitResults.messageBody:
JavaDoc comments help improve readability. Header comments to
non-private classes/methods, and non-trivial private methods.

commitResults.messageTitle: Edit code to comply Java coding standard
commitResults.messageBody:
Code should follow Java coding standard. Change Exception to be
more specific in Parser.java. Made fields private to follow
Encapsulation OOP.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add find command to search tasks by keyword
commitResults.messageBody:
Add parseFindKeyword() to extract keyword from "find <keyword>".
Add findTasksByKeyword() for case-insensitive description match.
Add showMatchingTasks() to display "Here are the matching tasks...".
Add JUnit Test cases for feature.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-A-JavaDoc'
Merge branch 'master' into branch-A-CodingStandard
Merge branch 'branch-A-CodingStandard'
Merge branch 'master' into branch-Level-9
Merge branch 'branch-Level-9'
Add Checkstyle config and enforce Javadoc across codebase
commitResults.messageBody:
Add Checkstyle configuration files, configure Gradle Checkstyle
tasks for main and test folders. Update codebase to follow
Javadoc coding standards and pass style checks. Fix formatting/
import ordering and other violations.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'A-CheckStyle'
Add JavaFX GUI for Bob
commitResults.messageBody:
Add getResponse(String) to Bob to return responses as strings for GUI.
Introduce bob.gui package with Main, Launcher, MainWindow, DialogBox.
Add MainWindow.fxml layout with ScrollPane, TextField, and Send button.
Add pictures for Bob(BobPic.png) and user(ComputingCat.png) in
resources/images. Add runGui Gradle task to launch the GUI

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor TaskList to add Varargs for add and constructor
commitResults.messageBody:
Add add(Task... tasks) overload to add multiple tasks at once
Add TaskList(Task... initialTasks) constructor for direct initialisation

commitResults.messageTitle: Revise output example for Bob program
commitResults.messageBody: Updated output message in README to reflect new format.

commitResults.messageTitle: Bundle JavaFX in JAR and launch GUI by default
commitResults.messageBody:
When jar is generated, running the jar file will not trigger the
GUI.

Running Jar file should open the GUI by default without having to
download JavaFX or other libraries.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add assert statements into each function to document assumptions
commitResults.messageBody:
Assumptions at method boundaries were not documented. Without
explicit checks, invalid states can cause failures hard to trace.

Assertions were added to validate assumptions during testing

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor code for better quality
commitResults.messageBody:
Code has long methods, duplicated logic and magic numbers, making
it hard to follow and maintain.

Refactoring done included:
* Replace run() and getResponse() duplication with processCommand()
* Split long methods into handleMark, handleUnmark, handleDelete,
handleTodo
* Introduce constants to replace magic string and numbers
* Use guard clauses to reduce nesting
* Add default branches in switch statements

commitResults.messageTitle: Use Streams in findTasksByKeyword
commitResults.messageBody:
Replace manual filter loop with stream-based filter and collect
for clearer code

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Reminders for urgent tasks less than 3 days
Add logic for urgent tasks marked as Done
fix: Bob's Response show in full message
Add better documentation in the README.md
commitResults.messageBody: Users will know how the Bob chatbot works and how to run it.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add more aesthetically pleasing chat bubbles
commitResults.messageBody:
Red chat bubble by Bob means that command is not recognised.
Grey chat bubble is default.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add text wrapping with input bar expanding vertically
commitResults.messageBody:
Input text can get very long and input bar will continue to
go leftwards with more text.

Changed it to expand vertically so that text can still be seen
even if the text gets too long.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add personality of Bob to be a sunny and happy vibe
commitResults.messageBody:
Colors of the chatbot interface, chat bubble, and input bar
should fit the theme

commitResults.messageTitle: Edit documentation to be more accurate
Add user guide to github pages
commitResults.messageBody:
Make sure it follows standards for GFMD. Ensure it is
comprehensive for the user, in a aesthically pleasing manner.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add table of contents to Github Pages
commitResults.messageBody:
Table of contents allow user on Github Pages to navigate easily
with just clicking the table of contents. This leads them to the
what they want.

commitResults.messageTitle: Create Jar file using Gradle for submission
commitResults.messageBody:
Do smoke tests with new release after downloading the jar file
named bob.jar
